headline: Ventas to Participate in Investor Meetings at Nareit’s REITworld 2024 Annual Conference
summary: CHICAGO, November 15, 2024--Ventas, Inc. (NYSE: VTR) ("Ventas" or the "Company") announced today that management will participate in investor meetings at Nareit’s REITworld 2024 Annual Conference (the "Nareit Conference") on November 18-19, 2024.
